title: [Placements] I am a 4th yr student with a cgpa of 7.3, need lil help regarding companies..
content: i just want to know what all companies come that have a cg criteria above 7+ so i can prep accordingly , any seniors please help!!!

comments.body: Please check placement sheet, has list showing which ones came with 7+ CGPA
u mean the last year list? its not updated fully

this year's I mean, even then none are fully updated bcoz no one maintained after a certain point. So u cant expect a full list, but atleast u will get a rough idea, if u want exact number contact PESU Placements
